description:
Great front-end in that it works and is intuitive enough for me, but just a couple of minor flaws, one is a bug to do with string formatting when renaming files that isn't really an issue so I won't go into it.

The second problem is that due to it being a flatpak it doesn't give access to the system directories by default, which means no access to mounted filesystems.

Being new to Linux, I don't know if this is something that should be configured in a flatpak when it's being built or if it's something the user should be expected to set up.

Not a major issue, but just thought I'd point it out.
Closes after Splash Screen on Steam Deck.
